author: kakwok
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #38941

Including emulator update in 12_5_X will help DQM comparison between data/emulator in P5 for HMT trigger. 

DQM plots have already been enabled in: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38639
title: Update muon shower (HMT) emulator [12_5_X]
